description: Metrics pulled from each UCS domain by the ucs-exporter.

panels.title: HBA Statistics for VNIC in Packets Received
HBA Statistics for VNIC in Packets Transmitted

targets.expr: (100 * avg by (domain, switch) (avg_over_time(ucs_kernel_mem_free{domain=~"${domain}"}[10m])) / avg by (domain, switch) (avg_over_time(ucs_kernel_mem_total[10m])))

title: Cisco UCS
